publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2238 Margaret Smith: Publication of Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland Annual Report-That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland intends to lay his Annual Report for 2000-01 before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.

S1M-2238 Margaret Smith: Publication of Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland Annual Report-That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland intends to lay his Annual Report for 2000-01 before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.
S1M-2238 Publication of Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland Annual Report (lodged on 20 September 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
